title: Patterned Valet Lanyard

product_features.name: Description
product_features.value: Our girls’ lanyard is perfect for keeping her keys and school ID on hand. A dual-sided release buckle and lobster claw clasp make it easy to detach her items. And an allover pattern is easy to spot in her backpack.

short_description: Our girls’ lanyard is perfect for keeping her keys and school ID on hand. A dual-sided release buckle and lobster claw clasp make it easy to detach her items. And an allover pattern is easy to spot in her backpack.
